title: Cucumber and tomato salad with feta and basil
ingredients: ['6 plum tomatoes, diced', '1 small cucumber - peeled, quartered lengthways and chopped', '3 spring onions, chopped', '15g fresh basil leaves, cut into thin strips', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '3 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste']
